title: Nothing prepared Japan for this - 8.9 QUAKE: Deaths, damage, nuclear crisis TSUNAMI: Water takes everything in its path
author: Unknown
text: Tsunami waves hit a residential area in Natori, Japan, after Friday's massive earthquake. The initial tsunami struck so quickly that many people had little time to flee. Rescuers help a young girl from a building in Kesennuma, northern Japan, on Saturday. Thousands remain missing after the quake and tsunami.Caption:  photoThe Associated Press / Kyodo News: Tsunami waves hit a residential area in Natori, Japan, after Friday's massive earthquake. The initial tsunami struck so quickly that many people had little time to flee.The Associated Press / Kyodo News: Rescuers help a young girl from a building in Kesennuma, northern Japan, on Saturday. Thousands remain missing after the quake and tsunami.
